players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I find it strange that Bob was the one who got eliminated during the night. Let's keep a close eye on each other and make sure we don't let the mafia infiltrate our ranks."

Diana: "I agree with Alice - Bob's death is concerning. We need to be very careful about who we trust. I'm wondering if we should share any information we might have gathered during the night to help us identify the mafioso among us."

Charlie: "I believe we should all share any information we have gathered during the night to help us identify the mafioso among us. Let's work together and keep an open dialogue to ensure our team's victory."
Diana: "Charlie seems very eager to have everyone share information - that makes me a bit suspicious. If someone has sensitive information, revealing it too early could make them a target."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie
